name: Dwarfed Together
description:
A little puzzle-platformer, that will have you "joining together" with other dwarves to explore an ancient vault in search of a treasure. Utilize your comrades' abilites and solve various puzzels. What riches lie at the end of this treacherous dungeon?

(Spoiler: the real treasure was the bugs we made along the way! If you are having troubles with Web player, try downloadable version. But there is a good chance the trouble will still be there :) )

Controls:

  • [A],[D] to move
  • [Space] to jump
  • [LMB] to shoot
  • [E] to pick up dwarf companions
  • [Q] to drop companions

When you're standing near the other dwarf, you can pick them up on your shoulders and move together. Then drop them if needed. But beware, every dwarf is a master of his own trade, and, well, if you lose the one who can jump, you won't be able to jump anymore.

Well, I worked alone, and kinda lost a lot of time, so no sounds, almost no graphics, and a lot of stuff that I just didn't test and bugs that I didn't fix. But it's ok I guess.
